all.classDescription: Comprehensive tutoring across multiple subjects tailored to your specific academic needs and goals.
all.bestFor: Students seeking support across multiple subjects or unsure which specific area to focus on.

algebra.classDescription: Master algebraic concepts from basic equations to advanced functions with step-by-step guidance.
algebra.bestFor: High school students and those preparing for standardized tests requiring strong algebra skills.

languages.classDescription: Master essential language skills in Arabic, English, Spanish, and French with native speaker instructors from beginner to advanced levels.
languages.bestFor: Anyone looking to learn new languages for academic, professional, or personal growth.

chemistry.classDescription: Explore the fascinating world of chemistry through interactive lessons and practical problem-solving.
chemistry.bestFor: High school and college students taking chemistry courses or preparing for science exams.

data-structures-algorithms.classDescription: Build strong programming foundations with essential data structures and algorithmic thinking.
data-structures-algorithms.bestFor: Computer science students and professionals preparing for technical interviews.

databases.classDescription: Learn to design, implement, and manage databases using modern database management systems.
databases.bestFor: Students pursuing computer science or information systems and professionals in tech roles.

geometry.classDescription: Understand geometric principles and their real-world applications through visual learning.
geometry.bestFor: Middle and high school students developing spatial reasoning and mathematical proof skills.

introduction-to-programming.classDescription: Start your coding journey with fundamental programming concepts and hands-on practice.
introduction-to-programming.bestFor: Complete beginners to programming and students starting computer science studies.

oop.classDescription: Master object-oriented design principles and create well-structured, maintainable code.
oop.bestFor: Students with basic programming knowledge ready to learn advanced software design concepts.

physics.classDescription: Discover the fundamental laws governing our universe through engaging problem-solving sessions.
physics.bestFor: High school and college students curious about how the physical world works.

pre-algebra.classDescription: Build essential math foundations to prepare for algebra and advanced mathematics.
pre-algebra.bestFor: Middle school students and those needing to strengthen basic math skills before algebra.

pre-calculus.classDescription: Prepare for calculus success with advanced functions, trigonometry, and analytical thinking.
pre-calculus.bestFor: High school students preparing for AP Calculus or college-level mathematics courses.

quran.classDescription: Study the Quran with proper recitation, understanding, and spiritual guidance from qualified instructors.
quran.bestFor: Muslims of all ages seeking to deepen their understanding and connection with the Quran.

web-development.classDescription: Create modern, responsive websites and web applications using current industry technologies.
web-development.bestFor: Aspiring web developers and students interested in creating interactive websites and applications.
